item.title: whoami
item.description: Ingredients: For 4 people : Lots of love 2 cans of crab meat 1 lightly beaten egg 1/2 lemon juice Breadcrumbs 1 tomato Hamburger bread Pickles 1 onion 4 salad leaves Frying oil Salt pepper For the sauce: Worcestershire sauce Ketchup Mustard Steps : tasks In a bowl, beat 1 egg then add the crabmeat, breadcrumbs, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Mix until you get a homogeneous consistency.
